title: Quartet: Four short stories, four explorations of the fantastic
description: A collection of four short stories by author Leo McBride. From a boy's supernatural connection to a grandfather clock, to a fantasy tale of an old man being hunted by knights, to a contemporary tale of the power of a photographer and a homeless man who may be more than he seems. Four tales to add a dash of wonder, a flash of fantasy, a question of what might be...
author: Leo McBride
